or <S%G2228><s%> does he <S%G3004><s%> say it assuredly <S%G3843><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our sake? <S%G2248><s%> Yes, <S%G1063><s%> it was written <S%G1125><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> our sake, <S%G2248><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> who plows <S%G722><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to plow <S%G722><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> threshes <S%G248><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> should partake <S%G3348><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> hope. <S%G1680><s%>

Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who serve <S%G2038><s%> around sacred things <S%G2413><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> from the things of <S%G1537><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and those who wait <S%G4332><s%> on the altar <S%G2379><s%> have their portion <S%G4829><s%> with the altar? <S%G2379><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> the <S%G1299><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> ordained that <S%G1299><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> proclaim <S%G2605><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> should live <S%G2198><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the Good News. <S%G2098><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I preach the Good News, <S%G2097><s%> I <S%G3427><s%> have <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> to boast about; <S%G2745><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%> is laid <S%G1945><s%> on me; <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I don't <S%G3361><s%> preach <S%G2097><s%> the Good News. <S%G2097><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> reward? <S%G3408><s%> That, <S%G2443><s%> when I preach the Good News, <S%G2098><s%> I may present <S%G5087><s%> the Good News <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> without charge, <S%G1519><s%> so as not <S%G3361><s%> to abuse <S%G2710><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Good News. <S%G2098><s%>

to those who are without law, <S%G459><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> without law <S%G459><s%> (not <S%G3361><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> without law <S%G459><s%> toward God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> under law <S%G1772><s%> toward Christ <S%G5547><s%>), that <S%G2443><s%> I might win <S%G2770><s%> those who are without law. <S%G459><s%>

To the weak <S%G772><s%> I <S%G1096><s%> became as <S%G5613><s%> weak, <S%G772><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I might gain <S%G2770><s%> the weak. <S%G772><s%> I have become <S%G1096><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, <S%G2443><s%> that I may <S%G4982><s%> by all means <S%G3843><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> some. <S%G5100><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sake <S%G2098><s%> of the Good News, <S%G2443><s%> that I may be <S%G1096><s%> a joint <S%G846><s%> partaker of it. <S%G4791><s%>

Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> know that <S%G3754><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> run <S%G5143><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a race <S%G4712><s%> all <S%G3303><s%> run, <S%G5143><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> the prize? <S%G1017><s%> Run <S%G5143><s%> like that, <S%G2443><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may win. <S%G2638><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Every man <S%G3956><s%> who strives in the games <S%G75><s%> exercises self-control <S%G1467><s%> in all things. <S%G3956><s%> Now <S%G3767><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> <S%G99999><s%> do it to <S%G2443><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> a corruptible <S%G5349><s%> crown, <S%G4735><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> an incorruptible. <S%G862><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> therefore <S%G5106><s%> run <S%G5143><s%> like <S%G3779><s%> that, <S%G5613><s%> as not <S%G3756><s%> uncertainly. <S%G84><s%> I <S%G4438><s%> fight like <S%G3779><s%> that, <S%G5613><s%> as not <S%G3756><s%> beating <S%G1194><s%> the air, <S%G109><s%>

but <S%G235><s%> I beat my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bring it into submission, <S%G1396><s%> lest by any means, <S%G3381><s%> <S%G4458><s%> after I <S%G4458><s%> have preached <S%G2784><s%> to others, <S%G243><s%> I myself <S%G846><s%> should be <S%G1096><s%> rejected. <S%G96><s%>
